name: Vegetarian Pasta Primavera
details: Boil pasta. Sauté mixed vegetables in olive oil. Toss with pasta. Season with salt, pepper, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Spicy Chickpea Curry
details: Cook chickpeas with onions, tomatoes, and spices. Serve over rice. Garnish with cilantro.

name: Grilled Halal Chicken Skewers
details: Marinate chicken in halal spices. Skewer and grill until cooked. Serve with garlic sauce.

name: Kosher Baked Salmon
details: Season salmon with kosher salt and herbs. Bake until flaky. Squeeze lemon juice before serving.

name: Gluten-Free Quinoa Salad
details: Cook quinoa. Mix with diced vegetables, olive oil, and lemon vinaigrette. Chill before serving.

name: Dairy-Free Coconut Curry Soup
details: Simmer coconut milk, vegetables, and curry paste. Add tofu or chicken. Serve hot with rice noodles.

name: Vegan Lentil Tacos
details: Cook lentils with taco seasoning. Assemble tacos with vegan toppings like guacamole, salsa, and lettuce.

name: Mediterranean Quiche
details: Whisk eggs, feta, olives, and spinach. Pour into pie crust. Bake until golden brown and set.

name: Halal Beef Kebabs
details: Marinate beef chunks in halal spices. Skewer and grill until desired doneness. Serve with tzatziki.

name: Kosher Chocolate Babka
details: Prepare chocolate filling. Layer with dough, roll, and twist. Bake until golden. Drizzle with icing.

details: Boil pasta. Sauté mixed vegetables in olive oil. Toss with pasta. Season with salt, pepper, and Parmesan cheese.

details: Cook chickpeas with onions, tomatoes, and spices. Serve over rice. Garnish with cilantro
